resources.string: The best cities to visit during this time are:
App made for PMDM subject by Diana Ramos Torrado
Activities that can be done there:
Write your note (no more than 3 lines)
There are no trips planned yet. If you want to plan a trip, select a city in the cities window or a country in the countries window

Amman, the vibrant capital of Jordan, seamlessly fuses the old and the new, creating a cityscape that unfolds across seven hills. Its skyline, adorned with a mix of contemporary structures and historical landmarks, paints a picture of an evolving metropolis. As you navigate its bustling streets, Amman welcomes with an atmosphere shaped by rich cultural nuances and the warmth of its people. The city%apos;s charm lies in the fusion of traditional markets with modern urban life, creating a dynamic setting where ancient history meets a burgeoning cosmopolitan identity. Amman invites exploration, offering a captivating narrative through its streets, neighborhoods, and the distinctive character of its urban landscape.

Madrid, the vibrant capital of Spain, seamlessly fuses the old and the new, creating an urban landscape that unfolds across its multiple neighborhoods. Its skyline, adorned with a mix of contemporary structures and historical landmarks, paints a picture of a vibrant and diverse metropolis. As you navigate its bustling streets, Madrid welcomes you with an atmosphere influenced by rich cultural traditions and the warmth of its people. The city\'s charm lies in the combination of traditional markets with modern urban life, creating a dynamic environment where ancient history meets a cosmopolitan identity in constant evolution. Madrid invites exploration, offering a captivating narrative through its streets, neighborhoods, and the distinctive character of its urban landscape.

New York, the bustling metropolis of the United States, stands as a testament to the harmonious blend of the old and the new. Its iconic skyline, adorned with a mix of contemporary skyscrapers and historic landmarks, tells the story of a city that never sleeps. As you navigate the lively streets of New York, you\'ll be embraced by an atmosphere shaped by diverse cultures and the energy of its inhabitants. The city\'s allure lies in the fusion of traditional neighborhoods with the pulse of modern urban life, creating a dynamic tapestry where history and innovation intersect. New York beckons exploration, weaving a narrative through its iconic streets, diverse neighborhoods, and the unique character of its urban landscape.
Discover the Metropolitan Museum of Art

Tokyo, the dynamic capital of Japan, captivates visitors with its seamless blend of tradition and modernity. The city\'s skyline, adorned with a mix of cutting-edge architecture and historic landmarks, unfolds a narrative of a metropolis that constantly evolves. Navigating Tokyo\'s vibrant streets, you\'ll encounter a rich cultural tapestry influenced by centuries-old traditions and the energetic pulse of contemporary life. The charm of the city lies in the coexistence of ancient temples and bustling neon-lit districts, creating an exhilarating atmosphere where the past and the future intersect. Tokyo invites exploration, offering a captivating journey through its diverse neighborhoods, iconic landmarks, and the unique character of its urban landscape.

London, the vibrant capital of the United Kingdom, enchants visitors with its timeless blend of history and modernity. The city\'s skyline, adorned with a mix of historic landmarks and contemporary structures, unfolds a narrative of a metropolis that has played a central role in shaping the course of history. As you explore London\'s bustling streets, you\'ll be immersed in a rich cultural tapestry influenced by centuries-old traditions and the pulse of contemporary life. The charm of the city lies in its diverse neighborhoods, iconic landmarks, and the unique character of its urban landscape. London invites exploration, offering a captivating journey through its historic sites, world-class museums, and the dynamic energy of its cosmopolitan atmosphere.

Cairo, the vibrant capital of Egypt, is a living testament to the country\'s rich history and modern influences. The city is adorned with ancient wonders like the Pyramids of Giza and contemporary structures, telling a captivating story of a metropolis that has stood the test of time. As you navigate Cairo\'s bustling streets, you will be immersed in a cultural tapestry shaped by millennia-old traditions and the vibrant spirit of its people. The city\'s charm lies in the juxtaposition of historic landmarks with the energy of modern urban life, creating a dynamic atmosphere where the past and present coexist. Cairo beckons exploration, offering a journey through its iconic sites, diverse neighborhoods, and the unique character of its urban landscape.
Stroll through Khan El Khalili Market

Sydney, the stunning capital of Australia, is a city of captivating beauty and modern allure. With its iconic Sydney Opera House and Sydney Harbour Bridge, the cityscape is a blend of architectural marvels set against the backdrop of the sparkling harbor. Sydney offers a diverse cultural experience, from the vibrant arts scene to the relaxed coastal lifestyle. Explore the sandy beaches, enjoy a ferry ride across the harbor, and immerse yourself in the dynamic atmosphere of this cosmopolitan metropolis.

Paris, the enchanting capital of France, is a city of timeless beauty and cultural richness. With iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and Louvre Museum, the cityscape is a masterpiece of art and history. Paris offers a romantic ambiance, charming boulevards, and world-class cuisine. Immerse yourself in the artistic legacy, stroll along the Seine River, and indulge in the vibrant atmosphere of this cosmopolitan city.
Enjoy a French pastry at a café

Albania, a hidden gem in the heart of the Balkans, unveils a tapestry of natural beauty and cultural richness. Nestled between mountains and the Adriatic Sea, its landscapes range from pristine beaches to rugged peaks, creating a diverse canvas for exploration. As you immerse yourself in Albania\'s allure, you\'ll encounter a blend of ancient history and modern vitality. The warmth of the Albanian people and the authenticity of its traditions add a unique charm to the experience. From historic sites to vibrant markets, Albania invites you to discover the layers of its fascinating narrative.

Spain, a hidden gem in the heart of the Iberian Peninsula, unveils a tapestry of natural beauty and cultural richness. Nestled between mountains and the Mediterranean Sea, its landscapes range from golden beaches to majestic peaks, creating a diverse canvas for exploration. As you immerse yourself in Spain\'s allure, you\'ll find a fusion of ancient history and modern vitality. The warmth of the Spanish people and the authenticity of their traditions add a unique charm to the experience. From historic sites to bustling markets, Spain invites you to discover the layers of its fascinating narrative.
Stroll through the Old Town of Toledo
Hike in the Picos de Europa

Japan, a land of ancient traditions and modern wonders, captivates with its rich tapestry of culture and natural beauty. From the serene landscapes of cherry blossoms to the bustling urban centers, Japan offers a diverse canvas for exploration. Immerse yourself in the allure of Japan, where ancient temples coexist with cutting-edge technology. The hospitality of the Japanese people and the meticulousness of their traditions create a truly enchanting experience. Whether exploring historic shrines or indulging in contemporary cuisine, Japan invites you to uncover the layers of its captivating narrative.
Experience the tranquility of Mount Fuji
Explore the vibrant streets of Tokyo
Discover the historic city of Nara
Relax in the hot springs of Hakone

France, a country of art, history, and culinary excellence, beckons with its rich cultural heritage and diverse landscapes. From the romantic streets of Paris to the sun-kissed vineyards of Bordeaux, France offers a mosaic of experiences for exploration. Immerse yourself in the elegance of France, where iconic landmarks blend with charming villages. The French passion for art, gastronomy, and fashion creates an enchanting ambiance. Whether wandering through medieval castles or savoring gourmet delights, France invites you to unveil the layers of its captivating narrative.
Visit the Louvre Museum in Paris
Indulge in wine tasting in Burgundy
Experience the charm of Alsace villages
